FileFormat.FormatDescription: Sparky is used in Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Spectroscopy, particularly spectral analysis. Sparky is a graphical NMR assignment and integration program for proteins, nucleic acids, and other polymers.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: University of Illinois / University of Illinois

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: Magic bytes ‘UCSF NMR’ followed by null, In addition, the byte offset 13 (0x0D) should be the number 2 (unsigned char, for version 2).
